Uses of Class
EditorModes.EditMode

  • Packages that use EditMode 
    Package Description
    EditorModes  
    GameObjects  
    Listening  

    • Uses of EditMode in EditorModes

      Subclasses of EditMode in EditorModes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddButton
      Adds a button to the maze that controls the movement of the last added Movable Box.
      class  AddFinish
      Add finish adds a FinishTile MazeObject at the position the mouse is clicked or is dragged to.
      class  AddMovingBox
      AddMovingBox adds a movable box on the tile the mouse was clicked.
      class  AddOnceButton
      Adds a button to the maze that controls the movement of the last added Movable Box.
      class  AddPowerUp
      AddPowerUp adds a powerUp of a certain type on the tile where the mouse was clicked.
      class  AddRotating
      AddRotating adds a rotatable MazeObject such as a ramp on the tile that was clicked.
      class  AddStart
      AddStart adds a StartArrow MazeObject at the position the mouse is clicked.
      class  AddStatic
      AddStatic adds non-rotatable MazeObjects such as Box of Floor on the selected tiles.
      class  DeleteMode
      Removes the MazeObject, Movable Box or PowerUp on the top of the stack where the mouse was clicked.
      class  MoveObject
      MoveObject moves the MazeObject that is selected when the mouse is clicked, to the position of the dragged mouse.
      class  ObjectMode
      ObjectMode is an abstract class that extends EditMode and that is the parent of all Edit Mode that add MazeObjects to the maze.
      class  ResizeMode
      The maze size is set so that the position the mouse is pressed or dragged to becomes the bottom-rightmost tile.
      class  RotateObject
      The selected Maze Object is rotated 90 degrees around a certain axis when the mouse is pressed.

    • Uses of EditMode in GameObjects

      Methods in GameObjects with parameters of type EditMode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Editor.setEditMode(EditMode editMode)
      Sets the mode of the editor to a certain mode.

    • Uses of EditMode in Listening

      Constructors in Listening with parameters of type EditMode 
      Constructor and Description
      EditModeCommand(Editor editor, EditMode mode)
